MODE_REG
[IINCHIP_REG]

Detailed Description

Mode register.
It sets the configuration which relates with host.

See also:
MR


Defines

#define MR   (__DEF_IINCHIP_MAP_BASE__)
 Mode register.

Define Documentation

#define MR   (__DEF_IINCHIP_MAP_BASE__)

Mode register.

RESET value : 0x3800 or 0xB800
MR sets host I/F, MSB/LSB swap of Sn_TX_FIOR & Sn_RX_FIFOR, S/W reset, internal TX/RX memory test, MSB/LSB swap of data bus and address mode.

Each bit of MR defined as the following.

  • MR_DBW : 15 bit
  • MR_MPF : 14 bit
  • MR_WDF(X) : 13~11 bit
  • MR_RDH : 10 bit
  • MR_FS : 8 bit
  • MR_RST : 7 bit
  • MR_MT : 5 bit
  • MR_PB : 4 bit
  • MR_PPPoE : 3 bit
  • MR_DBS : 2 bit
  • MR_IND : 0 bit
